name: Saanp Seedhi Matka
description:
Introducing the classic Saanp Seedhi (Snakes & Ladders) but with a casino twist


Features
------------
Multiplayer game - 4 players in a single session

Fun and easy to play

Funky interface

Invite and play with friends

Earn free coins

Play with other players across the world


Game play
---------------
The Main objective is to win as many as you can from the pot (matka). The players need to reach 100 to win the game. The player who reaches 100 first wins the all the pot money. But wait, there is more.

The player can bet on a particular dice number and with every successful bet, the player will take away some coins from the Matka.

Three correct bets on dice outcome in a row will win you a jackpot.

Every Ladder climb will give you some coins from the Matka.

Every Snake bite, the player will put back coins to the Matka.

If two players land on the same number the 1st player will have to pay coins the 2nd player.

The winner with the most amount of coins wins the game regardless of who reached the finish line.
